questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product's packaging?
What is the primary material of the product's packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
Does the packaging feature a resealable closure or zipper?
Is the text on the bag predominantly printed or embossed?
What is the approximate weight of the product indicated on the packaging?
What language(s) is the text on the packaging written in?
Does the packaging display any nutritional information?
Is there a barcode present on the package?
Does the packaging show any logos or brand names?
What is the texture of the packaging material; smooth or rough?
Is the overall appearance of the packaging matte or glossy?
Does the product packaging have any noticeable graphics?
Is the product contained in a bag, box, or other container?
Considering the overall design, what's the packaging style?
